message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product at a price of $12000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm looking to purchase the product for $10000. I believe this price is more reasonable considering the market value of similar products. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm hoping we can come to a mutually agreeable price.
